name: Inspector
description: A visual editing tool that connects with AI coding assistants like Claude Code, Codex, and Cursor. Click on UI elements, make visual adjustments, and Inspector automatically writes changes to your codebase.

name: blivz
description: Open source tool for custom tech stack and marketing workflows. Runs locally and uses Claude Code for lead generation and GTM workflows.

name: Base44
description: Backend platform optimized for Claude Code and Cursor. Provides complete backend services for AI agent applications with one-command deployment.
community_quotes: Backend technology for the AI era
Optimized for Claude Code and Cursor

name: JDoodle.ai
description: Chat-generated website development integrating with ChatGPT and Claude. Supports frontend, backend, and full-stack application development with real-time preview.

name: Qwen Code
description: Open-source AI agent for the terminal, optimized for Qwen models. Part of Qwen3.5 focusing on native multimodal agents.

name: Code Arena
description: Compare multiple AI development applications at once. Input a single prompt and compare outputs from top AI programming models side-by-side, then export ready-to-run code to GitHub or your IDE.

name: Cline CLI
description: Command-line tool for automated coding with parallel agents, CI/CD integration, headless mode, and ACP support. Multi-editor compatibility for developers.

name: GitHub Agentic Workflows
description: GitHub's automation platform for AI agents in CI/CD pipelines. Integrates AI agents with deployment practices for automated status reports.
community_quotes: Continuous AI works best with CI/CD

name: Oz
description: Cloud agent orchestration platform enabling parallel execution of hundreds of cloud agents. Quick startup with production-ready PR management via CLI or mobile.

name: Axel
description: AI programming assistant - native macOS application for work scheduling and task management. Integrates with Claude and supports Codex with keyboard-driven operation.
